.. _how-to-contribute:

Contributing to psy-simple
==========================

.. raw:: html

    <p>
        The documentation of psy-simple is now hosted at, <a href="https://psyplot.github.io/psy-simple/contribute.html">https://psyplot.github.io/psy-simple/contribute.html</a>.
        You should be redirected within 5 seconds.
    </p>
